bookinfo.title: ERPNext User Manual
bookinfo.subtitle: A ERP system for Entrepreneurs and SMEs.

abstract.para: Entrepreneurs and SMEs have the same complexity of large companies but do not hace the resources to invest in a custom solutions to run theirs business and keep track of accounting, taxes, bills and invoices. ERPNext helps you to take full control of your business. It is powerful, flexible, customisable and easy to use.
